bibl.title: Greek translation of Latin Literature in the fourth century A.D.
bibl.note: Voir II (pp. 183-189): Juxtalinear translations: Vergil and Cicero. Discussion de trois exemples: P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 30885 a + e (= Pack2 2922); P. Ryl. III, 478 (= Pack2 2940); Palimps. Ambros. (= C.P.L. 7; Pack2 2943).
bibl.seg: Fisher Elizabeth A., Greek translation of Latin Literature in the fourth century A.D.
